content:
Hans Christian Larsen Hans Christian Larsen













March 8, 1931 – July 13, 2020

Hans Christian Larsen, born March 8, 1931 in Copenhagen Denmark, passed away July 13, 2020, in Parksville BC.

He moved from Kitimat to Nanaimo then Parksville where he spent the last 2 years.

Hans is survived by his son Finn Larsen (Anna) and daughter Susan Bare (Dave), daughter-in-law Carol Larsen along with a multitude of grand-children, great grand-children and great great grandchild.

Hans was predeceased by his wife Gudrun Irene Larsen and son Leif Christian Larsen.

Rest in peace.
title: Hans Christian Larsen Hans Christian Larsen – Kitimat Northern Sentinel
